title: DOJ Weaponization and Political Prosecution Coordination
description: Documentation of Department of Justice politicization, specific cases, prosecutor targeting, and coordination mechanisms. Identified 566 pattern instances showing systematic efforts to weaponize DOJ for political purposes.
research_questions: What are the specific mechanisms used for DOJ weaponization?
Who are the key actors coordinating political prosecutions?
What timeline evidence exists for systematic DOJ politicization?
Which prosecutors and cases show evidence of political targeting?
How does DOJ weaponization coordinate with other institutional capture efforts?
source_analysis: Trump Tyranny Tracker Batch 1 Analysis - 566 DOJ weaponization patterns identified across 45 articles
